title: This board is a joke
body:
Does riot even read the posts on this board? Do they forget we're predominantly customers, paying for a service.. 
The last reply from a rioter was 3 DAYS AGO. Ever since 5.5 dropped there's an incredible amount of people reporting lag spikes, freezes and crashes and I haven't heard anything so much as a murmur?
5.5 is loaded with bugs, and is infuriating to play the latest patch on any apple computer but I guess you can just sweep mac problems under the rug since it probably only accounts for 5% of players right? (not too much profit margin there)

I can't understand how it's so hard to reply to our posts riot when you're receiving at maximum 1 post PER HOUR.
I'm simply not impressed by the level of customer support, and to be honest I think you can do better.

replies.body:
>Does riot even read the posts on this board? Do they forget we're predominantly customers, paying for a service..

Not really. It's not like we need to pay a subscription service to play League, and all money we do pay them is only to convert our currency into a format usable by the game for aesthetic enhancements, not even related to game-play.
---
The rest of what you said is pretty much spot on, though.
dude last riot reply was 2 hours ago

That's still a bit... ergh. There should be more replies than there are new discussions created, accounting for the fact that this tool supports threaded conversation (ie. new discussions don't account for absolutely every message sent, thus there's a lot less discussions created than there are messages sent).

And even that, I haven't seen a red reply to this board specifically for ages. I think they should have at least one guy on duty here, you know?
